document.docAuthor: Bolger, Thomas, Arroyo, Julio & Piotrowska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the species of Mesostigmata (Arachnida, Acari, Parasitiformes) recorded from Ireland including information on their geographical distribution and habitats

1976); soil of sugar beet crop ( Breslin, 1979 );
Iris
bog, bracken bed and
Salix
ditch at seashore ( Purvis,
1982); rough grassland, cliff (Bolger, in press); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ; O’Connell & Bolger,
1997b, unpublished data); soil under Norway spruce ( Heneghan, 1994, unpublished data ); soil in spruce
and broadleaved woodland (unpublished data).
Counties: Carlow, Dublin, Galway, Kildare, Kilkenny, Mayo, Wexford, Wicklow .

Irish Records : Under bark ( Halbert, 1915 ); on seashore (Halbert unpublished notes); pasture ( Curry, 1969a ; Valarasan, 1971 ); pasture on peat ( Whelan, 1976 ); soil in winter wheat field (unpublished data); pine shelter belt and pasture on bog ( Longworth, 1973 ); leaf litter ( Hyatt, 1990a ); fungal sporocarp ( O’Connell, 1994 ); soil under horse chestnut, oak and mixed broadleaves (unpublished data). Counties: Carlow , Clare , Dublin , Kerry , Kildare , Kilkenny , Mayo , Sligo .
